text: Ara mada'iyanabasidera prati tadera bha'i soyayeba (ah) ke prerana karechi. Tini balalena-he amara ka'oma! Allahara bandegi kara, tini chara amadera kona mabuda na'i. Ara parimape o ojane kama di'o na, aja ami tomaderake bhala abasthaya'i dekhachi, kintu ami tomadera upara emana ekadinera ayabera asanka karachi yedinati paribestanakari.
